text: I congratulate and sympathize with thousands of black women from all over Brazil who met today, in Brasilia, in the #MarchesDomesMulheresNegras
The fight of #MarchaDasMulheresNegras is against racism, violence and social and gender inequality, a subject that is also governed by my government.
The #MarchHealthNegras creates a force to contain prejudice. Long live the citizenship of the black woman!
I received a group of women in Planalto and reaffirmed our commitment to combat racism (...)
(...) against violence and for guaranteeing rights and opportunities for black women. #MarchWomen'sNegras
We have the responsibility to improve our policies to promote racial equality, against violence and for the valorization of women.
Photos of the meeting with representatives of #MarchaDasMulheresNegras https://t.co/RuSzqDUbHk
